alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 1:38PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY PRECIPITATION FOR UPPER HOOD RIVER VALLEY THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING... Temperatures have remained in the low 30s in the Hood River Valley this afternoon, allowing precipitation to fall as snow, mainly at elevations above 1500 feet. Expect minimal accumulation through this afternoon as temperatures continue to hover near freezing. Precipitation may briefly transition to freezing rain late this afternoon or early this evening before temperatures finally warm above freezing and allow precipitation to change over to rain. Expect minimal ice accumulation, but surfaces still may be slick at times through this evening.
